resources.string: In 2005,A Vallabh Budhi Polytechnic has been started in the field of Engineering and Technology as per guidelines of (AICTE) All India Council for Technical Education, New Delhi and Gujarat Technological University. The college VBP is located at Narayan P. Patel Education Campus (NPPEC), Bhanunagar, Tal. Jalalpore , Dist. Navsari ,South Gujarat in a peaceful and pollution free environment in richest agro industrial zones of the western region of the country. The college (VBP) is at a distance of about 35 Km. from Surat and 5 Km. from Navsari Railway station.
